sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>Upload Files</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-form @submit.prevent="submitFiles">
              <v-file-input
                v-model="file1"
                label="Select File 1"
                prepend-icon="mdi-paperclip"
              ></v-file-input>
              <v-file-input
                v-model="file2"
                label="Select File 2"
                prepend-icon="mdi-paperclip"
              ></v-file-input>
              <v-file-input
                v-model="file3"
                label="Select File 3"
                prepend-icon="mdi-paperclip"
              ></v-file-input>
              <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" class="mt-4">Upload Files</v-btn>
            </v-form>
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row class="mt-4">
      <v-col cols="12" md="4" v-for="file in uploadedFiles" :key="file._id">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title>{{ file.filename }}</v-card-title>
          <v-card-actions>
            <v-btn :href="`http://localhost:3000/image/${file.filename}`" target="_blank">
              View File
            </v-btn>
          </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      file1: null,
      file2: null,
      file3: null,
      uploadedFiles: [],
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.fetchUploadedFiles();
  },
  methods: {
    fetchUploadedFiles() {
      axios.get('http://localhost:3000/files')
        .then(response => {
          this.uploadedFiles = response.data;
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error("Error fetching uploaded files:", error);
        });
    },
    submitFiles() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      if (this.file1) formData.append('file', this.file1);
      if (this.file2) formData.append('file', this.file2);
      if (this.file3) formData.append('file', this.file3);

      axios.post('http://localhost:3000/upload', formData, {
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
        }
      })
      .then(response => {
        console.log("Files uploaded successfully:", response.data);
        this.fetchUploadedFiles(); // Refresh the file list
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.error("Error uploading files:", error);
      });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.mt-4 {
  margin-top: 1.5rem;
}
</style>
